cause.description:
My friend has type 1 diabetes and when we were camping i watched her inject herself with insulin, and though she denies it it look so painful. But even then, painful or not, that would be a hassle to check your blood and inject yourself. So I'm starting this cause to find a cure for Diabetes so my friend and everyone else with Diabetes can be free from this harassment.
1. Will Help find a cure for diabetes
2. It's not fair that some people have to inject themselves:(
cause.mission: To Find A Cure For Diabetes.
cause.name: Diabetes
